=C2=A0 








Oh brother...are you kidding us, Snow?
=C2=A0
For wha=
t it's worth, the file in question is unmistakable to my ears and DEFINITEL=
Y says "South Africa." 
=C2=A0
Why can't some=C2=A0people hear these things=
? I=C2=A0understand now=C2=A0why Frank gets so frustrated at times, especia=
lly when people tell=C2=A0him (or Steve or anyone, really!) what their file=
s "really" say. 
=C2=A0
Further, I don't think people here share their=C2=
=A0files so that others can (mis)=C2=A0"interpret" their recordings=C2=A0fo=
r them! 
=C2=A0
I've seen this happen over and over and over again (usually=
 by the same people) and personally I feel that it's incredibly rude, conde=
scending and totally obnoxious. 
=C2=A0
My two cents, 
J
=C2=A0
